snippet: A tribute to Addie Herder (1920-2009) shows her gift for collage in nearly 40 works over more than 30 years.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews collages by Addie Herder at Pavel Zoubok Gallery.
lead_paragraph: A tribute to Addie Herder (1920-2009) shows her gift for collage in nearly 40 works over more than 30 years.

headline.seo: ADDIE HERDER: ‘Intimate Scale: The Art of Addie Herder’
headline.main: Addie Herder: ‘Intimate Scale: The Art of Addie Herder’
headline.print_headline: Addie Herder: ‘Intimate Scale: The Art of Addie Herder’
